subscription.heading: Please select the subscription type you would like for
subscription.free: Start your digital storefront with basic information
subscription.basic: Best value for businesses looking to enhance the digital storefront with a limited budget
subscription.plus: For businesses looking to stand out using Hindsyght's proprietary search engine and sales/marketing features
subscription.examplePageHeading: We know that different firms have different needs, so Hindsyght offers multiple subscription options to fit your business. Below, we break down what each subscription level has to offer, from digital storefront customization to reporting and analytics. Need to upgrade to another level? Hindsyght also allows you to change your subscription level at any time.

checkout.subscriptionRules: You’ll be charged ${{ yearlyPrice }}.00 yearly until you cancel your subscription. Previous charges won’t be refunded when you cancel unless it’s legally required. Your payment data is encrypted and secure. All amounts shown are in USD.
checkout.certify: I agree to the Hindsyght Terms of Use and the Automatic Renewal Terms stated above.
